item.title: 美联储穆萨勒姆称进一步降息空间有限
item.description: 圣路易斯联邦储备银行行长阿尔贝托-穆萨莱姆表示，他支持上周的降息，认为这是针对劳动力市场疲软的一种保险措施，但他认为在通胀高企的情况下，进一步降息的空间有限。【原文：Federal Reserve Bank of St. Louis President Alberto Musalem said he supported last week’s interest-rate reduction as a way to take out insurance against a weakening labor market, but sees limited room for more cuts amid elevated inflation.】

item.title: Oura 戒指制造商通过最新融资将成为市值 110 亿美元的公司
item.description: 广受欢迎的 Oura 健康和健身戒指制造商 Oura Health Oy 在过去一年中售出约 300 万枚戒指，估值接近 110 亿美元。【原文：Oura Health Oy, the maker of the popular Oura health and fitness ring, is closing in on a roughly $11 billion valuation after selling about 3 million rings over the past year.】

item.title: 苹果公司 2025 年前景看好，股价反弹接近历史最高水平
item.description: 周一，苹果公司股价突破了今年的正值区间，这是该公司股价上涨的最新里程碑，iPhone 制造商的股价已接近创纪录的水平。【原文：Apple Inc. shares broke into positive territory for the year on Monday, the latest milestone in an advance that has put the iPhone maker within striking distance of record territory.】

item.title: 交易员等待新催化剂，美国股市回落
item.description: 在平静的一周开始之际，美国股市远离历史高点，交易员们正在寻找新的催化剂来进一步推动市场。【原文：US stocks stepped away from all-time highs as a quiet week began with traders looking for new catalysts to push the market further.】

item.title: 以色列的战争成本因袭击加沙城而增加 75 亿美元
item.description: 据一位以色列政府官员称，以色列夺取加沙城的行动预计将在今年年底前增加 250 亿谢克尔（75 亿美元）的战争开支。【原文：Israel’s push to take over Gaza City is expected to add 25 billion shekels ($7.5 billion) to the war bill through the end of the year, according to an Israeli government official.】

item.title: 渴求美元的米莱在阿根廷投票前暂停征收农作物关税
item.description: 哈维尔-米莱伊总统暂时取消了阿根廷所有农作物货物的出口关税，以期在关键的中期选举前将美元引入该国，支撑市场抛售。【原文：President Javier Milei temporarily scrapped export tariffs on all of Argentina’s crop cargoes in a bid to bring dollars into the country to shore up a market sell-off before a crucial midterm election.】

item.title: 贝森特表示将采取 "所有方案 "稳定米莱的阿根廷地位
item.description: 美国财政部长斯科特-贝森特（Scott Bessent）承诺向阿根廷总统哈维尔-米莱（Javier Milei）提供 "所有稳定方案"，因为这个南美国家正面临市场大跌。【原文：US Treasury Secretary Scott Bessent pledged to provide “all options for stabilization” to Argentine President Javier Milei as the South American country faces a market selloff.】

item.title: Patient Square 将以 26 亿美元收购 Premier 私人公司
item.description: Patient Square Capital 是由前 KKR & Co. 交易员 Jim Momtazee 创办的投资公司，该公司同意以 26 亿美元的全现金交易收购医疗服务公司 Premier Inc.【原文：Patient Square Capital, the investment firm started by former KKR & Co. dealmaker Jim Momtazee, agreed to buy out health-services company Premier Inc. in an all-cash deal valued at $2.6 billion.】

item.title: 阿达尼集团计划削减杠杆，预计 2027 年前不会发行美元债券
item.description: 印度企业集团阿达尼集团（Adani Group）的目标是在未来五年内降低杠杆率，并在 2027 年之前不打算在国际资本市场上发行债券。【原文：Indian conglomerate Adani Group aims to cut its leverage over the next five years and has no plans to issue bonds in international capital markets until 2027.】

item.title: 华尔街在 200 亿美元的 M&A 债务上与私人信贷分庭抗礼
item.description: 随着交易活动的复苏，以及华尔街银行将私募股权投资雨后春笋般涌现的公司从直接贷款人怀抱中解救出来的努力初见成效，华尔街银行正在排队安排超过 200 亿美元的并购债务。【原文：Wall Street banks are in line to arrange more than $20 billion of M&A debt, as deal activity revives and their efforts to prise private equity rainmakers out of the arms of direct lenders starts to pay off.】

item.title: 英特尔需要芯片厂获胜才能维持 500 亿美元股价涨势
item.description: 英特尔公司（Intel Corp. ）在获得一连串高知名度的支持者后，股价一飞冲天，但这些现金注入对解决该公司最大的问题--亏损的芯片制造业务--却收效甚微。【原文：Intel Corp. shares are flying high after the firm secured a string of high-profile backers, but the cash infusions have done little to fix the company’s biggest problem — its money-losing chip-making operations.】

item.title: 摩根士丹利将 ASML 上调至增持评级，ASML 再添牛股
item.description: 本周一，摩根士丹利（Morgan Stanley）加入了ASML控股公司（ASML Holding NV）的 "牛股 "行列，为该公司近期的涨势注入了新的动力。【原文：ASML Holding NV’s recent rally got a fresh boost on Monday as Morgan Stanley joined the ranks of the stock’s bulls, signaling that the chip-equipment maker may at last show a major uplift from artificial intelligence demand.】

item.title: 特朗普出席联合国年会，面临数十亿美元会费未缴问题
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普将与世界各国领导人一起参加联合国的年度会议，他是这个世界机构最响亮的批评者和最大的债务人之一。【原文：President Donald Trump will join world leaders for the United Nations’ annual gathering as one of the world body’s loudest critics — and biggest debtor.】

item.title: 战争导致财政紧张，俄罗斯考虑削减开支和增加税收
item.description: 由于乌克兰战争带来的财政压力持续上升，俄罗斯计划明年将联邦支出持平，同时考虑增税，以帮助填补不断扩大的预算缺口。【原文：Russia aims to hold federal spending flat next year while weighing tax hikes to help plug a widening budget gap as fiscal pressure from the war in Ukraine continues to mount.】

item.title: Strive 收购 Semler Scientific，合并比特币国债
item.description: 新成立的 Strive Inc. 同意收购 Semler Scientific Inc.【原文：Newly-formed Strive Inc. agreed to acquire Semler Scientific Inc. in a deal that combines two publicly-traded Bitcoin treasury companies.】

item.title: 吉姆-拉特克利夫的英力士集团发行 6.5 亿欧元担保债券
item.description: 据一位熟悉内情的人士透露，英国亿万富翁吉姆-拉特克利夫（Jim Ratcliffe）旗下石化公司英力士集团控股公司（Ineos Group Holdings SA）的融资部门正在推销一笔 6.5 亿欧元（约合 7.65 亿美元）的高级担保债券。【原文：The financing unit of UK billionaire Jim Ratcliffe’s petrochemical firm Ineos Group Holdings SA is marketing a €650 million ($765 million) senior secured bond, according to a person familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 甲骨文任命马古埃克和西西利亚为首席执行官，接替卡茨的职位
item.description: 甲骨文公司周一晋升两位高管 Clay Magouyrk 和 Mike Sicilia 共同担任首席执行官。自2014年以来一直领导公司的萨夫拉-卡茨（Safra Catz）将出任董事会执行副主席。【原文：Oracle Corp. on Monday promoted two executives, Clay Magouyrk and Mike Sicilia, to the joint role of chief executive officer. Safra Catz, who has led the company since 2014, will become the executive vice chair of the board.】

item.title: 高盛集团的帕斯夸瑞洛表示要 "负责任地看涨 "股票
item.description: 高盛集团对冲基金主管托尼-帕斯夸瑞洛（Tony Pasquariello）认为，在大型科技公司的支持下，股市再次飙升至历史新高之际，投资者应该 "负责任地看涨"。【原文：At a time when stocks are yet again roaring to all-time highs on the back of big tech companies, investors should be “responsibly bullish,” according to Tony Pasquariello, head of hedge fund coverage at Goldman Sachs Group Inc.】

item.title: 经济开始降温，巴西分析师下调 2026 年塞里奇汇率预期
item.description: 在巴西央行重申将在可预见的未来维持紧缩货币政策以抑制通胀之后，巴西分析师下调了 2026 年年末利率预测。【原文：Brazil analysts lowered their 2026 year-end interest rate forecasts after the central bank reaffirmed it would keep its monetary policy tight for the foreseeable future to tamp down inflation.】

item.title: 天气变冷，风力发电量下降，英国电价攀升
item.description: 英国当日电价攀升至 6 月以来的最高点，原因是风力发电产出减少，而寒冷天气又增加了能源需求。【原文：UK day-ahead electricity prices climbed to the highest since June, as a lull in wind-power output coincides with colder weather that’s increasing energy demand.】

item.title: 在补救审判中打破谷歌广告技术垄断
item.description: 周一，美国司法部再次获得机会，迫使 Alphabet 公司旗下的谷歌公司解体，司法部将在弗吉尼亚州联邦法官面前出庭，该法官曾裁定这家搜索巨头非法垄断了广告技术市场。【原文：The Justice Department gets a second chance to force a breakup of Alphabet Inc.’s Google Monday as it heads to court before the Virginia federal judge who ruled the search giant illegally monopolized advertising technology markets.】

item.title: 霸菱前老板未能阻止有关银行家被挖角奖金的诉讼
item.description: 霸菱集团全球私人融资部前联席主管未能阻止其前雇主提出的 630 万英镑（850 万美元）的诉讼，该诉讼指控他在发放奖金的第二天策划了公司信贷人员的集体叛逃。【原文：The former co-head of global private finance at Barings failed to block his ex-employer’s £6.3 million ($8.5 million) lawsuit that alleged he plotted a mass defection of the firm’s credit staff the day after their bonuses were paid.】

item.title: 洪水保险公司 Neptune 的支持者在首次公开募股中寻求 3.68 亿美元资金
item.description: 洪水保险公司 Neptune Insurance Holdings Inc. 的股东正寻求在美国首次公开募股中募集 3.684 亿美元，这为今年首次公开募股的保险公司数量再添一员。【原文：Flood insurance company Neptune Insurance Holdings Inc.’s shareholders are seeking to raise $368.4 million in a US initial public offering, adding to the flow of insurance firms debuting this year.】

item.title: 印度最大房地产投资信托基金计划首次出售 1.81 亿美元卢比债券
item.description: 据熟知内情的人士透露，印度最大的房地产投资信托基金 Knowledge Realty Trust 计划通过其首次债券销售，在在岸市场筹集高达 160 亿卢比（1.81 亿美元）的资金。【原文：Knowledge Realty Trust, India’s largest REIT, plans to raise as much as 16 billion rupees ($181 million) in the onshore market through its first ever bond sale, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 雷-达里奥推广的量化交易反弹，涨幅达 19
item.description: 由雷-达里奥（Ray Dalio）倡导的风险平价投资风格正在悄然反弹。【原文：Risk parity — the investing style popularized by Ray Dalio — is quietly bouncing back.】

item.title: 特朗普签证冲击令印美关系紧张，贸易谈判蒙上阴影
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）限制外国人技术签证的举动给上周才似乎有所好转的美印关系增添了新的打击，为迅速达成贸易协议设置了新的障碍。【原文：President Donald Trump’s move to curb skilled visas for foreigners adds a fresh blow to US-India ties that only last week appeared to be on the mend, creating new hurdles for a speedy trade deal.】

item.title: 总部搬迁后，花旗集团金丝雀码头办公室将进行全面改造
item.description: 位于伦敦金丝雀码头区的花旗集团中心（Citigroup Centre）由两栋大楼组成，其中较矮的一栋将进行大修，因为该银行准备在耗资 10 亿英镑（14 亿美元）进行升级改造后，重新启用毗邻的印有其标志的摩天大楼。【原文：The shorter of the two buildings that make up the Citigroup Centre in London’s Canary Wharf district is set to be overhauled as the bank prepares to reoccupy the adjoining skyscraper that bears its logo after a £1 billion ($1.4 billion) upgrade.】

item.title: 星山公司寻求发行捆绑私人信贷的债券
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，星山资本（Star Mountain Capital）正计划出售由其私人信贷基金股权支持的债券。【原文：Star Mountain Capital is planning to sell bonds backed by stakes in its private credit funds, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 在飞往迪拜的巨型客机上，特朗普的 H-1B 签证费引发混乱
item.description: 9 月 19 日，在一架阿联酋航空公司的航班即将从旧金山飞往迪拜前不久，机舱内的乘客开始听说美国总统唐纳德-特朗普决定对 H-1B 签证征收 10 万美元的申请费。【原文：Shortly before an Emirates flight was set to depart from San Francisco to Dubai on Sept. 19, passengers in the cabin began hearing about US President Donald Trump’s decision to slap a $100,000 application fee on the H-1B visa.】

item.title: Adnoc 在全球交易中的磕磕绊绊阻碍了其扩大影响力的努力
item.description:
对于阿布扎比国家石油公司来说，寻找合适的交易并将其进行到底是一项挑战。【原文：

Finding the right deal and seeing it through is proving to be a challenge for Abu Dhabi’s national oil company.

】
